name: First Day On The Job (James Berkelmans)
name_original: First Day On The Job (James Berkelmans)
description:
It's your first day at work as a carpenter. 

You feel calm. 

It is a good day.

Controls:

W, A, S, D  to move.

Mouse / track pad to look around.

Left mouse button to use the nail gun.

James Berkelmans - Design, Code

Adrian Moore - Design, Audio

Ben Wilkinson - Design, Art

This game was created in 48 hours for the 2020 Global Game Jam!
